review: Just rec'd this item yesterday and it is awesome. Very easy to set up and the remote is very responsive. I want to thank Mike Williams for taking the time to answer my emailed question regarding this item. I purchased this because my Samsung Smart TV was very slow in response, the choice of APPS was poor and it was constantly buffering. The Fire TV Stick responds immediately, the remote is very easy to use at night, and it is very easy to add APPS. There is no buffering so far. I use closed captions because I need to keep the sound down as this TV is in the bedroom and it is very quiet here at night. The captions on the Samsung were always flashing and very hard to read on Prime movies. Now I can control the caption size and color much easier. I just love this!!!
